name: Emulated Skylander Character or Item
summary: A SKY file contains data used to load a Skylander (or item) while playing a Skylander video game in a PC-based emulator, such as RPCS3 or Dolphin. Using SKY files allows players to load Skylanders without a connection to a Skylanders Portal. Players can create their own SKY files with RPCS3, or they can download pre-existing SKY files from the internet.
